author: glinda121

review: After years of wanting to cut the cord with my cable company, I finally decided on an Amazon Fire and Amazon Prime to enable me to stream content instead of relying upon cable. There are tons of options on Amazon Prime that are available for viewing at no charge beyond the Amazon Prime membership and are appropriate for 2-5 year olds (exactly what I was looking for). The Amazon Fire TV is very easy to set-up and use. I love it!
